DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial study support group program improving quality life underserved urban Latina breast cancer survivor . A psychosocial support group program may help reduce distress improve health-related quality life underserved urban Latina breast cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Support Group Program Improving Quality Life Underserved Urban Latina Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate effect support program Latina breast cancer survivor use validated measure health-related quality life . II . Evaluate effect support program Latina breast cancer survivor use validated measure general distress . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . A brief qualitative assessment evaluate perception program among intervention participant use brief survey . OUTLINE : Participants randomize 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants attend support group session 1-1.5 hour weekly 10 week . The session include facilitated discussion among participant follow topic : stress management emotional coping strategy , nutrition physical activity , sexuality body image , medical advocacy , self-care social support . Participants receive binder rationale topic , technique learn , activity complete session summarize show Chair-robics digital video disc ( DVD ) . ARM II : Participants receive one phone call arrange follow-up promotora , note acknowledge participation study , community resource booklet . Participants yoke one 3 intervention group ask attend 30 minute session similar Arm I .
